text.div:
Rubella (Tests for rubella virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    54091-4 Rubella virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    60274-8 Rubella virus RNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    85690-6 Rubella virus genotype in Unspecified specimen
    85796-1 Rubella virus E1 gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    86589-9 Rubella virus RNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection
    91792-2 Rubella virus RNA [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    91823-5 Rubella virus RNA [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
